pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, March 2, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

Toronto, Ontario

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the global mineral exploration and mining convention hosted by the Prospectors & Developers Association of Canada (PDAC). The Prime Minister will be accompanied by the Minister of Natural Resources, Seamus O’Regan, the Minister of Small Business, Export Promotion and International Trade, Mary Ng, and the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages, Mélanie Joly.

Metro Toronto Convention Centre
255 Front Street West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to present themselves to room 105 no later than 3:15 p.m.
